mean_cn: n. 无线电通讯；电信学
mean_en: the technology of sending and receiving signals, images, etc., over long distances by telephone, television, satellite, etc.
word_etyma: tele 远，电 + communic通讯 + ation 名词后缀 + s...学 →  通讯；电信学
short_phrase: She makes use of telecommunications technology.
sentence: It is the biggest company in telecommunications in China.
sentence_trans: 这是中国电信行业最大的公司。
